thread.title: Another great stay in this great hotel
thread.title_full: Another great stay in this great hotel - Review of Hotel Duquesne Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: jk201795
title: Another great stay in this great hotel
text: Last weekend was my fourth visit to Hotel Duquesne Eiffel. This time I travelled with four of my friends and previously with my wife and other couples. This hotel suits all. It is in a great location within easy walking distance of the Eiffel Tower and, indeed, numerous other attractions, metro stations and excellent restaurants. Rooms are exceptionally clean, with a clear view of the Eiffel Tower from several of them. Staff are very helpful and friendly. Looking forward to my next visit.
